summary:
- **Buy-back Type:** On-market buy-back  
- **Total Buy-back Program:** Up to AUD 400 million worth of ordinary shares  
- **Buy-back Period:** 28 March 2025 – 27 March 2026  
- **Shares Bought Back to Date:** 8,316,890 (8,109,529 before 8/7/2025 + 207,361 on 8/7/2025)  
- **Total Consideration Paid to Date:** AUD 156,012,935.01 (AUD 151,892,900.04 before + AUD 4,120,034.97 on 8/7/2025)  
- **Price Range:** AUD 16.95 (low, 31/3/2025) – AUD 20.01 (high, 8/7/2025)  
- **Broker:** Goldman Sachs Australia Pty Ltd  
- **No shareholder approval required.**  

*No other material information identified.*
